===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# seed of the [[w:Ziziphus|Ziziphus spinosa]] (An [[herb]] used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] to calm the mind, promote sleep, treat hypertension, palpitation and poor memory; also used as a "yin" tonic.)
